bayes.classifier.solution

Class SpamClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayes.classifier.solution.SpamClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClassifier

    public class SpamClassifier
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClassifier
    Author:
    jspacco Pr(S|W) = Pr(W|S) * Pr(S)
    ---------------------------------
    Pr(W|S) * Pr(S) + Pr(W|H) * Pr(H)


    Which remember, is the same as this:
    Pr(S|W) = Pr(W|S) * Pr(S)
    ---------------------------------
    Pr(W)

      • probSpamGivenWord

        public java.lang.Double probSpamGivenWord(java.lang.String word)
        Description copied from interface: IClassifier
        Compute the probability that a message is spam given that it contains the given word, using the corpus of messages that has so far been used for training.
        Specified by:
        probSpamGivenWord in interface IClassifier
        Parameters:
        word - The word to test.
        Returns:
        The probability (between 0.0 and 1.0) that a message is spam given that it contains the given word, or null if the probability for the given word cannot be computed.

      • isSpam

        public boolean isSpam(java.io.InputStream in)
        Description copied from interface: IClassifier
        Read a message from the given InputStream. Return true if the message is spam (i.e. its score is below the current threshold) and false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isSpam in interface IClassifier
        Returns:
        True if the given message is spam; false if it's ham.
